title: Taylor's Soundtracks and Swiftie Approved Shows
description:
In honor of her song Carolina in the movie Where The Crawdads Sing, we talk about the songs that Taylor has featured in films and shows.. Plus, a couple of Taylor approved binges to get into! Plus, some behind the scenes show speculation..
Which song is your fav? And what would you like to hear from us? Let us know!!

CONTACT THE PODCAST!
